summary:
The code defines a module for handling wave audio files. It imports necessary modules and defines constants for wave format types. It also defines a named tuple `_wave_params` to store wave file parameters such as number of channels, sample width, frame rate, number of frames, compression type, and compression name. The `getmarkers` function returns `None`. The module also includes a `Wave_write` class (not shown) and `open` function (which may be used to open a wave file). The code also defines a `Error` class.
